name: Prayer Times
body:
### Prayer Times for Al Ain, UAE
This is a simple Python script I hacked together to automatically tweet Al Ain prayer times. Many improvements are planned, so please don't take the script as it is.

### Help
If you can provide any help, edits, or advice, please don't hesitate to contact me.

### Contact
I can be reached at Twitter (@Cyph0n) or through GitHub.
tagline: Automatically tweets prayer times for Al Ain, UAE.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
